results.text: Ur as illi urbaâ ara t isellken, war Öebbi. Ur isellek iman is.
Akka, laânaya s$uô Öebbi, Tidep. Yif akw i ukafi, Yif akw i taggara.
Awi yasen d amedya n tmeddurt n ddunit. Am aman id Nesse$li seg igenni. Eâluâlen yissen im$an n tmurt. D$a u$alen d asa$uô, issebruzzaâ iten wavu. Ni$ Öebbi Izmer i yal cci.
Ayla akked dderya d ccbaêa n tmeddurt n ddunit. Ar Mass ik, leûlaê idumen ifen ten i ukafi, ifen ten i tmeôoiwt.
Ass ideg ara Nesselêu idurar, a pwaliv tamurt d aza$aô. A ten Nefser, ur Neppaoa yiwen segsen.
A d rsen zdat Mass ik, d leûfuf: "ni$ tusam a£ d, akken ikwen Nexleq tikelt tamenzut. Irna tetebbtem ar ur awen Neppara ppaâud, d awez$i".

Ters ed Tezmamt. A pwaliv ibe$wviyen s uêebbiô, $ef wayen illan degs. Qqaôen: "a yamxix nne$! Acimi tazmamt agi ur teooi ayen meééiyen, u wayen meqqwôen, armi ten teêseb"? Ufan illa wayen xedmen. Mass ik ur Idennis yiwen.
